oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |uma provides words and sentences at Mowbray in May 1880. These include parts of the body, some biographical information, things eaten in his country and the names and some descriptions of various plants. 1) p.10 210v: the name of |uma's father (||ko |kue); the name of |uma's country (|ka-saba); the name of !nanni's relations' country (||no o), 2) p.10 217v: (5 September 1881) The name of !nanni's country, 3) This story is found in Book XIII & XIV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: |uma at Mowbray, May 1880
